name: outfitters
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK old-fashioned a shop that sells men's clothes or uniforms: a gentlemen's outfitters
US a shop that sells clothes and equipment for various activities: We went to a wilderness outfitters to buy some new camping gear before we headed into the Rockies.
